email.title: DoCSoc Committee Positions
email.text:
**Leadership Elections 2019** are now open and nominations are now open for DoCSoc's 2019/20 committee. Nominations will run **until 12:00 on Friday 1st March**.
We have written a **detailed blog post** which includes the responsibilities for every role and other information you should know when running for a committee position. If you are looking to run for a DoCSoc committee position, we strongly recommend you read this.
Read the blog post here: https://docsoc.co.uk/articles/2019-02-20-election-positions/
If you have any questions, please feel free to reach out to us at docsoc@imperial.ac.uk or get in touch with a current committee member!
